title.rendered: “Intense IDF Operations in Gaza Strip: Terrorist Elimination, Weapon Locating, and Infrastructure Attacks”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Elimination of terrorists, locating weapons and attacking terror infrastructures; intense fighting continues in west Khan Yunis, in the north and in the center of the Strip

IDF forces continue joint fighting in the Gaza Strip. The soldiers are eliminating terrorists, locating many weapons, and in parallel, Air Force forces continue to attack terror infrastructures directed by the ground forces. The forces continue intense fighting throughout Khan Yunis, north and center of the Strip.

In the center of the Strip, the combat team of the Nahal Brigade eliminated and arrested terrorists during the last day. During the activity, the force identified a group of armed terrorists in a nearby area, the soldiers fired at them and eliminated the terrorists.

In west Khan Yunis, the Commando Brigade continued raids on terror targets. Maglan Unit soldiers located many weapons, including Kalashnikov rifles, dozens of grenades and magazines, RPG missiles, vests and charges.

The combat team of the Paratroopers Brigade eliminated several terrorist groups in the west of the city during the day. During the attacks in the last day, the combat team of Brigade 646 eliminated several terrorists, located and neutralized additional weapons.

Attached is documentation of IDF attacks in the Gaza Strip: https://bit.ly/42HcscX

Attached are pictures from the forces’ activity in the Gaza Strip: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC1002202402975
